column2: The quality of being exuberant; cheerful or vigorous enthusiasm; liveliness.
swoon (over somebody) to feel very excited, emotional, etc. about somebody that you think is sexually attractive
To decrease, shrink, diminish, reduce in size or intensity.
To induct into office with a formal ceremony.
To limp; move with a limping gait.
(games) A game played on a lawn, in which players use mallets to drive balls through hoops (wickets).
The back of any animal; especially the upper or projecting part of the back of a quadruped.
a long narrow cut in the ground, especially one made by a plough for planting seeds in (rãnh, đường cày....
The lower shaft of a feather, specifically the region lacking barbs.
Aphantasia is a condition that makes it hard or impossible to create mental images.
